description: The Chinese Plum Yew (Cephalotaxus fortunei) is an amazing evergreen species native to central and southern China. This plant reaches heights of 6 to 8 feet with needles that are a regal emerald green. In the spring, it produces dainty yellow flowers that form into bright red round fruits when ripe. Its dense foliage makes it a great choice for privacy hedges and it's easy to grow, thriving in both sun and shade. Best of all, it has great pest and disease resistance and can withstand periods of drought. Chinese Plum Yews are a charming addition with their unique texture and color, making it a must-have for any garden.
